definition: Electric field instrument (EFI) faceplate (FP) plasma density at 16 Hz
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp," ms",Time stamp in milliseconds  since 01-Jan-0000 00:00:00.000 UTC,1,CDF_EPOCH
Latitude,deg,"Geodetic latitude, WGS84 ellipsoid",1,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude,deg,"Geodetic longitude, WGS84 ellipsoid",1,CDF_DOUBLE
Height,km,"Height above reference ellipsoid, WGS84",1,CDF_DOUBLE
Current,nA,Calibrated measured Faceplate current,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Density,cm-3,Plasma density from the faceplate current,1,CDF_DOUBLE
